/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. Dominating the right side of the frame is a tall brick water tower, standing as a testament to the city's industrial past. The tower is topped with a green dome, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochromatic structure. 

On the left side of the image, a blue car is parked on the street, adding a modern element to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor that guides the viewer's eye through the image. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape below.
